entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's name is mentioned as the one who benefits from the introduction of various wizards. (e.g. 'mainly for Harry’s and Hermione’s benefit')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's name is mentioned as someone who benefits from the introduction of various wizards.

entities.name: cuthbert mockridge
entities.description: Cuthbert Mockridge is introduced as the Head of the Goblin Liaison Office. (e.g. 'That was Cuthbert Mockridge, Head of the Goblin Liaison Office')

entities.name: gilbert wimple
entities.description: Gilbert Wimple is introduced as a member of the Committee on Experimental Charms. (e.g. 'Here comes Gilbert Wimple; he’s with the Committee on Experimental Charms')

entities.name: arnie
entities.description: Arnie's name is mentioned as an Obliviator and member of the Accidental Magic Reversal Squad. (e.g. 'Hello, Arnie . . . Arnold Peasegood, he’s an Obliviator')

entities.name: arnold peasegood
entities.description: Arnold Peasegood is introduced as an Obliviator and member of the Accidental Magic Reversal Squad.

entities.name: bode
entities.description: Bode's name is mentioned as someone from the Department of Mysteries. (e.g. 'and that’s Bode and Croaker . . . they’re Unspeakables')

entities.name: croaker
entities.description: Croaker's name is mentioned as someone from the Department of Mysteries.

entities.name: bill weasley
entities.description: Bill Weasley is introduced as he comes out of the woods with his family.

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: Charlie Weasley is introduced as he comes out of the woods with his family.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is introduced as he Apparates into the scene.

relationships.description: Gilbert Wimple is a member of the Committee on Experimental Charms. (e.g. 'Here comes Gilbert Wimple; he’s with the Committee on Experimental Charms')
Arnold Peasegood is a member of the Accidental Magic Reversal Squad. (e.g. 'Hello, Arnie . . . Arnold Peasegood, he’s an Obliviator — member of the Accidental Magic Reversal Squad')
Bode is from the Department of Mysteries. (e.g. 'and that’s Bode and Croaker . . . they’re Unspeakables')
Croaker is from the Department of Mysteries.
Percy Weasley is the brother of Bill Weasley. (e.g. 'Just Apparated, Dad,’ said Percy loudly')
Percy Weasley is the brother of Charlie Weasley.
Bill Weasley is the brother of Charlie Weasley.
